summary: Most requirements for a light SaaS-style redesign, motion polish (scroll reveal + hover), parallax, cursor micro-interaction, skills icon cards, project cards with thumbnails, decorative backgrounds, and updated global tokens/SEO meta appear implemented. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the required image assets were actually added to the repo, and some required Hero/Projects details are truncated so cannot be fully verified (profile image tilt/floating; exact “View on GitHub” label).

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero right column includes a profile image inside a rounded card with soft shadow, with the image slightly tilted or floating.
missing_requirements.reason: HeroSection.tsx is truncated before showing any right-column/profile image card markup; only background and left column content are visible in the provided diff summary, so the profile image card/tilt cannot be verified from evidence shown.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims it exists but not shown in code excerpt)

missing_requirements.requirement: Each project includes a clear “View on GitHub” link pointing to the exact existing URLs already used in the app.
missing_requirements.reason: ProjectsSection.tsx is truncated at the Button markup; the visible excerpt shows URLs and card layout, but does not show the actual rendered link label “View on GitHub”, so this AC cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required light-theme image assets and variants: hero-bg-light.dim_1920x1080.png, accent-orb-light.dim_800x800.png, profile.dim_900x1100.png, project thumbnails, decor-shapes-light.dim_1400x900.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references these assets under /assets/generated/, but the diff summary contains no evidence of image files being added/updated (only TSX/CSS/HTML/JS). Therefore the image deliverables cannot be verified as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer branding/credit link to “caffeine.ai” and a hardcoded © 2026 line.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding third-party branding/credit in the footer or changing the copyright year; this appears as an extra addition beyond the specified design requirements.
